title: [Vipershroud, Brackish Stream]
description: The stream widens here, forming a small swamp.  Biting flies latch onto anything remotely alive, sucking the life-giving blood out with gusto.  Although the trees are sparser in this area, those that have survived are huge, continuing to block the moonlight with their spreading upper branches.
